title: Audit Create Command
description: This schema is used as the schema to create audit entries.

id.description: The primary identifier of the audit entry

userId.description: ID fo the User that is interacting with the data

resourceCategory.description: Category of the Resource that is the target of the audit entry

resourceType.description: Type of the Resource that is the target of the audit entry

resourceId.description: ID of the Resource that is the target of the audit entry

action.description: The action of the audit entry. CREATE, UPDATE, READ, DELETE

dataMap.description: Map of extra data to be included with the audit entry
